duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with the Executive Director & School Principals in community-facing projects to engage current and new parents.
Manage and build relationships with community-based leaders and organizations to increase awareness of school choice and mission.
Coordinate and provide on-site support for family engagement events and registration days at the schools and in the community.
Manage communications with interested families and applicants, including email, voicemail, and social media.
Timely and accurate data entry that will influence the creation, implementation, and revision of recruitment goals.
Support school-based teams to provide planning, training, and direct allocation of staff time/resources around family engagement and enrollment.
Develop, implement and oversee lottery applications on Student Information System.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education, Social Work, or a related field (Master's preferred)
